speaker: Tavern Keeper
lines: 'Welcome, traveler. Looking for trouble or coin?'
The Broken Mug is loud tonight; dice clatter and songs stumble.
A barmaid weaves through the crowd with a tray of frothing mugs.
Old maps and dented shields hang crooked on the walls.
The keeper wipes a glass with a threadbare cloth, eyeing you.
He leans closer, voice low enough to cut beneath the noise.
